inn1.comm: starts with a wide down the leg side, some swing early for the seamer, Ahsan Raza stretches his arms
goodish length on middle, gets back and turns it into the leg side for a single
straying on the pads, slightly short on leg stump, turned past square leg but he covers it well to prevent the single
short of a good length on middle, gets back and turns it into the leg side, in front of midwicket, for a quick single
nice, in the channel outside off, short of a good length and moves away a hint, Dilshan shoulders arms to that one
kicked off the pitch and moved away, Dilshan withdraws from it after initially shaping himself for a slash, but it bounced way more than he expected and left it alone in the end
drops it slightly short on leg stump, struck on the thigh, it rols into the on side for a single
Dilshan goes after him immediately, given a bit of width and he slashes that over the in-field, over cover and point, for a boundary
appeal for caught-behind, nipped back in sharply from outside off, clips the top of the pad on the way to the keeper, Pakistan don't call for the review
swinging in towards leg, tries to flick it square but is struck on the pads, was drifting down the leg side
targeting leg stump, almost lands in the blockhole, digs it out awkwardly back to the bowler, good pace from this guy

clips the pads once again and goes to the boundary, straying down the leg side and he was looking to play it fine, brushed the pads and beat the keeper, oh he's called it five wides, I thought there was a deflection

dragged it on! Short of a good length and it came back in, Dilshan prepared himself for a cut and the shot was on, but the nip back probably did him in as he inside-edged it back onto the stumps, one down
pushes it quick and full on the off stump, Sanga shows the full face as he plays it back to the bowler
short of a good length on the off, turns it wide of midwicket for a couple of runs
short of a good length again and this leaves the left-hander, prods at it and beats the outside edge
nipped back in from middle, turns the face on that one and plays it to fine leg for a single
short of a good length on middle and off, gets across and drops it back down the pitch
similar length and this nips back in as well, was he struck in the box? Sanga tried to turn it square and was floored by that one
short of a good length on middle, knocks it down into the off side
bowled it short on leg stump, turned it square off the back foot for a couple of runs
pitching it on a good length on leg stump, driven gently towards midwicket
fires it on a good length on middle, defends it watchfully down the pitch towards mid-off
short of a good length on middle, covers it nicely, gets behind that one and defends it with a full face
angles it on middle and off, gets on the front foot and taps it towards cover point
good length on middle and off, pushed through firmly but straight to mid-off
freebie, that, on the pads, slightly short, Sanga tried to glance it down but it clipped the thigh on the way to the fine-leg boundary
back of a length on middle, rocks back and defends it solidly back to the bowler
drops it short on the off, knocks it in front of point, thinks of a single but it's not available
angling it away from Sanga, just a bit of away movement, Sanga prods at it but is beaten at the last moment
quicker and got some extra bounce there, short of a good length and he tried to play at it, looking to open the face, was beaten once again
this one came back in, tight line around off this time and got it to dart back in towards middle, Sanga negotiated it well
goodish length on the off stump, pushed soundly towards extra cover
bowled it on a good length on middle, gets forward and pushes it towards cover
Opens the face on that fullish delivery and runs it down to third man for a single
goodish length on middle, Sangakkara walks across and punches that down to mid-on
poor line, straying on the pads, that's a full delivery and he flicks it elegantly over square leg for an easy boundary
driven beautifully on the up, pitched on a good length outside off stump and this one held its line, Tharanga stood tall and caressed it through extra cover
oversteps, shortish on middle and it's defended into the leg side, freehit coming
bowled off a freehit, was the slower one, clever change of pace, was the offcutter, Tharanga made room and tried to swing it over midwicket, missed it completely
back of a length on the off, taps it back down on the pitch from the crease
guides it down towards third man for a single
short of a good length on the off, pushed off the front foot wide of extra cover
back of a length on the off, nips back in, drops it behind point
pushing loosely at that one is the batsman, angled away from the left-hander, tries to strike it in the direction of extra cover, misses
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it to point
pitched up on the off stump, there is a short cover in place as a catcher and he crunches this one straight to him
the bouncer, banged it short on leg stump and he ducked under that one comfortably
stands tall against that one and pushes it off the back foot wide of extra cover
beaten, shaping away from the left-hander, lands short of a good length on the off and nips away as he comes forward to play it, lovely delivery, much closer to the off stump this
shortish on middle and off, rocks back does Sanga and plays it back to the bowler
goodish length on the off stump, this one holds its line, defended towards mid-on
Banged it short on middle and Sanga ducked under it well
shortish outside off, a bit of room there for Sanga and he chops it down to point
short of a good length on middle, gets behind it and plays it down the pitch
back of a length outside off, chops it down towards extra cover off the front foot
firing it short on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it towards midwicket
goodish length on middle, gets front and across to play it towards extra cover
back of a length on middle, drops it towards point from the crease
back of a length on middle and off, stands tall and defends it towards extra cover
sharp pace from Cheema, bowled it short on middle and Tharanga ducked under that one
short and Tharanga sensed a chance there, turned it wide of the short fine leg fielder for a couple of runs
ooh, some late movement there, Sanga had moved across to begin with but had to check his shot at the last moment there as it nipped away late
takes a couple of steps down the pitch and defends that gently into the leg side as Razzaq drops that a little short
angling it on middle and leg, that's tickled down towards fine leg for a single
slower one this time, bowled slightly short on leg stump, turned away towards a slightly squarish fine leg for one more

got him, a wicket in his first over, short of a good length outside off that held its line, Sanga tried to pinch a single by opening the face there, got a faint tickle and the keeper took a good, low catch. Sanga walked
in the channel outside off stump, he shoulders arms to that one
a bit of away turn, lands on the off and turns away, defended into the off side
floating in towards middle, turned past square leg for a single
flat on the off stump, pushed gently back towards the bowler
plays it softly down the ground towards long-on to get off the mark
goes on straight, round the wicket, on middle, defended back down the pitch
pushes it through straight, tried to play it towards extra cover but it held its line, got a thick inside edge towards midwicket
chases a wide one, Razzaq bowls it short of a good length and Tharanga, who hasn't quite got a move on as yet, slashes but not convincingly
timed that one well did Tharanga, pitched on a good length and he drove that through the line, Razzaq kicked it away wide of mid-on for a single
kept really low, very low in fact, was the attempted slower legcutter and it almost died on the pitch, Chandimal did well to play it into the on side
angling it in towards middle, gets across and plays it towards square leg
short of a good length on the off, pushed off the back foot towards extra cover
shortish on the off, drops it towards point thinking of getting a single but can't quite manage that, it's not there
quicker through the air on middle and didn't turn, went on straight, Tharanga almost was bowled there, just managed to get his bat in the way at the last moment as he chopped it to point
gave it a bit of air, plays it back down the pitch
appeal for lbw, was probably going down the leg side, went on straight as well and struck him in line with leg as he tried to push that down the ground, the angle would have taken it down
comes down the track, isn't to the pitch, pads it away
driven down the ground towards long-on for a single
tossed up on middle, lands full and he drives it down the ground for more one
short of a good length outside off, cracks it towards point
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it to midwicket
that came out of nowhere, Chandimal chanced his arm there, pitched up, was on a length and since mid-on was in, he took the liberty to clear him by hitting it through the line, went all the way
short of a good length on the off, punched towards extra cover
misdirected slower one from Razzaq, the legcutter, landed well short and too wide and went away further
short of a good length on the off, pushed towards mid-on for a single
shortish on middle, gets front and across to tap it down into the leg side
turning in from over the stumps, tucked to the leg side.
full ball outside off, defended off the front foot.
nudged with the turn to midwicket for a single.
turns away from Tharanga, who opens the face and defends to the off side.
very full on off, Tharanga tries to get under it and heave away and nearly picks out mid-on.
fired in flatter outside off, played into the covers from the crease.
down the leg side, tries to glance it down, misses, called a wide
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the leg side
finds the gap, short of a length and it nipped back in, he stood tall and chopped it hard past a diving point to fetch a boundary
goodish length on the off, drops it softly in front of cover and races through for a single
back of a length on middle, punches it back towards the bowler
slower one bowled slightly short outside off, guides it past point for a single
slower one bowled short and Chandimal cuts that well, wide of third man for a couple of runs, things are picking up now
angling in towards middle, chipped it back uppishly and it just fell short of Hafeez as he dived to his right, fumbled and allowed them a single
shortish on middle, turned away wide of square leg for a single

probably didn't go in the direction he intended, Tharanga made room to that flighted delivery and it appeared as though he wanted to loft it over extra cover, ended up slicing it over point instead, had enough on it to take it to the ropes
pushed away into the off side
lands outside leg, gets across to dispatch it over midwicket, is struck n the pads

Tharanga's efforts at improvisation fail him eventually, tossed up and he was looking to clear mid-on this time, tossed up and he struck it loosely straight to the fielder positioned there. Cheema took a straightforward catch
straying on the pads, turns it through the in-field on the leg side, there's two on offer and he gets it
goodish length on the off stump, gets forward and plays it towards extra cover
slower one bowled slightly short outside off, run down to third man for a single
appeal for run-out, knocks it gently in front of cover, Chandimal calls and races through for a single, Misbah scores a direct hit, picking it up from cover but Chandimal is in, dragged his bat in
tight line on middle and off, taps it watchfully back to Razzaq
shortish on middle, worked away off the back foot through square leg for a single
floating in towards middle, played into the leg side
slower through the air, on middle, is a little late in playing it but knocks it into the leg side
pushed through towards midwicket
Chandimal's taking his chances and they're paying off, that was tossed up, landed in the slot on middle, and he slog-swept it against the turn into the stands over deep midwicket

Boom Boom strikes! Fires in a quick one and Chandimal is caught by surprise, bang straight on middle and he is beaten by the pace, struck in front of middle and the only issue may have been height but he hasn't asked for a referral, he goes after a briefly entertaining knock. Would have hit off and middle, and the height was okay
was that the googly? Appeared like it, defended solidly into the off side towards cover
turned into the leg side behind square for a single
turns in from a good length on the off, defended down the pitch
flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
waits for that one to turn in and rolls it down towards square leg
that was the doosra, turned away after landing outside off, Mahela played it to cover
turns it from middle behind square for a single
fires it down the leg side does Afridi, and the keeper fumbles too, a single
tossed up on the off stump, plays it back to the bowler
the googly, turns in from a good length on the off, pushes it back down the pitch
flighted on middle and off, defended gently towards extra cover
quicker one on middle and leg, played it wide of square leg for a single
slower through the air this time, lands slightly short on the off, defended in front of point
gets forward and plays it wide of square leg for a single
tosses it up on the off, gets front and across and plays it wide of midwicket for a single
floating it full on leg stump, turned away towards square leg
defended watchfully in front of extra cover
the doosra, spots it and plays in front of point for a quick single
flighted on middle, gets on the front foot and pushes it to midwicket
much flatter, on middle and leg, tickled past square leg for a single
pushed in the direction of mid-off

Appeal for an lbw and we have a referral, That went on straight, Mahela gets across and tries to play it through midwicket while closing the face, misses, replays show it would have scraped the leg-stump, the umpire had given it not out and he upholds that decision since it's only scraping the leg stump
ooh, thick inside edge and it goes behind square
that was the googly, gets front and across, didn't quite pick it, got a thick inside edge again towards square leg
shortish, gets on the back foot and turns it into the leg side
gets front and across to play it into the leg side, is hit on the thigh as he tries to turn the face
flighted on the off stump, reaches forward and plays it back down the pitch
slightly short outside off, chops it down towards short third man
Mahela takes it from outside off and paddles it down towards long-leg for a single
short on the off, punched off the back foot down to long-on for a single
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot straight to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, pushed calmly in the direction of extra cover
slightly short, punched off the back foot towards deep cover for one more
down the leg side from Afridi, called a wide
flatter on the off stump, played it down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted on the off, driven down towards long-off for a single as well
flatter on the off, knocked it down towards extra cover
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it to long-on for a single
drops it into the off side
gets a leading edge as he tries ot play that into the leg side, went straight on
floating it on leg stump, gets across and turns the face towards square leg
slightly short on the off, rocks back and plays it into the leg side
punched off the back foot towards the bowler, slightly short from the bowler
tossed up on middle, driven towards midwicket off the front foot
things have quietened down significantly since the last wicket, defended into the off side, but off a leading edge
tossed up on middle, pushed it back towards the bowler
down the leg side.
back of a length, played to the leg side.
full ball, Mathews pushes down the ground for one.
the drifter outside off, Mathews is a little late spotting it but manages to force it away off the outside edge to third man.
he's again played it inside the line, Hafeez is not turning them at all. Outside edge goes away to the off side.
full ball, Mathews gets forward and defends.
length ball is pushed back to the bowler
pitched up and outside off, driven towards mid-off
forward defensive to the off side
length ball on middle and leg stump, clipped towards midwicket

a run-out ends Mathews' stay, that was tucked behind square leg, there was no run in it, though Mathews seemed to think there was, he charges down the track before being turned back, he dives to try make his ground, but the throw was at the top of the stumps and the keeper whips off the bails before Mathews can return
tossed up, full ball that is just about squeezed out by debutant Kosala Kulasekara
flighted delivery is nudged to square leg
length ball is helped along fine towards fine leg
length ball outside off and that is left alone
blocked off the front foot towards mid-off
length ball again, more defence from Kulasekara
careful forward defensive to end the over, that was a quick, quiet one
angling in towards middle, pushes it back to the bowler
lobs up after striking him on the pads, turned in from outside leg stump
drifting in towards middle, plays it with a full face back towards the bowler
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down towards extra cover
slower through the air, full outside off, pats it towards extra cover
drops it short on leg stump, turns it through square leg for one more
tossed up on the off stump, gets across and plays it down the pitch
shortish on the off, chops it towards point from the crease
plays it down the ground towards long-on for a single

not the best of debuts with the bat for Kulasekara, was clearly sucked in by the flight there, tempting delivery that landed full on the off and he chipped it loosely straight towards a perfectly-positioned mid-off, a dolly of a catch to Umar Gul
pushed off the front foot towards point
looping it around off stump, gets across and turns it to midwicket
bowled it flat on the off, gets across and turns it towards midwicket
gets front and across and plays it towards square leg
that was the doosra, turned from a good length outside off, away from the bat, he chased that one and was beaten
gets on the back foot and plays it into the off side
goes down the leg side, called a wide, spun down sharply
flighted on middle, pushes it back towards the bowler down the pitch

What was Mahela doing there? Almost holed out, stepped out of the track and just chipped it towards long-on, landed well short of the fielder but he would have been admonishing himself had he holed out
defended off the front foot into the off side
shortish on middle, gets across and turns it towards square leg
gets on the back foot to punch it towards midwicket
floating on middle, gets on the back foot to turn it towards square leg
shortish on middle, knocks it down towards square leg
drifting in towards off and middle, gets across to play it down to short fine leg
fires it short on middle and leg, goes off the thigh to short fine leg
turned towards square leg off the front foot, just the single
went on straight, Prasanna got some width there and he cracked it over the in-field on the off side, didn't get hold of it but managed three runs
flighted on the off, driven down to long-on for a single
slightly short on leg stump, tries to turn it square, was struck high on the pads
fullish on the off stump, pushed towards extra cover, Younis Khan prevents the single
played back down the pitch towards the bowler
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and blocks
floating it full on middle, pushed down the pitch
short and quick on leg stump, turned behind square leg for a single
gets across and dabs that wide of square leg for another single

Another one goes, it's Mahela and Sri Lanka are sinking, given the field was up, Mahela tried to sweep that over short fine leg but ended up playing it into the hands of Razzaq who was prowling the area for a catch, took it comfortably
that was the doosra, that turned away from outside off, chased it and then pretended to withdraw
almost cleaneed him up, doosra landing on the off and turned away as he tried to close the face on that one, completely beaten
Malinga has a swing and ends up playing it past square leg for a single
turned towards short fine leg, no run on offer there
chopped it towards point
slightly short, makes room and cuts it towards point where Umar Akmal does a good job diving to his left
turned away wristily towards square leg, a quick single taken
flighted on middle and off, defends it off the front foot
Afridi strikes again, and strikes that pose, the googly, Prasanna had made his mind up to go after that one, came down the track, had a wild swing, missed and Sarfraz did the rest, stumped
knocked away, Afridi's return has been a successful one
Malinga won a game for the Mumbai Indians with the bat in the Champions League, he can hit it a long way and does just that, short on the off and that's thwacked over the deep midwicket boundary
fires it into the blockhole on the off, dug out back to the bowler
bowls it flat outside off this time, has a swing again does Malinga, misses
smacks that wide of long-on for a single this time
stumped, fooled by the doosra again, tossed it up on the off and Lakmal charges down the track to send it to Abu Dhabi, misses it as it turns away, another easy stumping for Sarfraz
predictably, another doosra and he doesn't have much of an idea, beaten as he prods at it
dropped, short ball, was slapped back hard back to Afridi and he couldn't hold on, attempted to catch it with one hand, juggled it a couple of times and then spilt it
dragged from the off stump towards deep midwicket for a couple of runs
Afridi cleans him up with a googly, Malinga made room to thump that over midwicket but didn't pick the googly, missed and was bowled

inn2.comm: aiming for the blockhole first up, ends up being a wide down the leg side and Sangakkara fumbles behind the stumps, three in all
bowls it full outside off, steered towards third man for a single to get off the mark
swung in from Malinga, Imran Farhat didn't have much of an idea about that, played well outside the line and was beaten through the gate
swinging in again but this time it lands full on the pads, turned away towards square leg
oversteps, swung in again and it's handled well, lands on a good length on middle, plays it with a straight bat back to the bowler, freehit coming
a slower one bowled full outside off and Farhat fails to connect, chases it but doesn't move his feet and misses
short of a good length on middle, pushed back past the bowler towards mid-on, another no-ball, another freehit
edged and caught, was the slower one bowled outside off and he tried to swing it high and mighty into the stands, got a thick edge and was taken at slip, worth an attempt from Farhat
straying on the pads, full on leg stump and it's flicked fine, wide of fine leg, for a couple of runs, a diving save in the deep prevents the boundary
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it in the direction of extra cover
banged in short and Hafeez dispatches it, latches onto the length early and punishes it with a stylish pull over midwicket
gets a leading edge there as it nips away from middle, tries to whip it towards midwicket but checks it at the last moment, lands short of extra cover
back of a length on the off, knocks it down towards cover
Hafeez goes early, presents a dolly to mid-on, short on the off and he appeared caught in two minds, eventually jabbing it towards mid-on, a soft dismissal for Hafeez who had begun well
bowls it on a good length outside off, Lakmal getting it to shape away, Younis guides it down to third man for a single
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it towards cover
back of a length on the off, Younis covers the line of the ball and plays it to point
short of a good length on middle, gets across and works it wide of midwicket for a single
slightly short on the off, gets back and drops it towards point
full and quick on middle, driven firmly but straight to mid-on
slower one bowled full on middle, turned it softly in front of square leg and raced through for a single
short and wide, gives an opportunity for Farhat to free his arms, slashes it hard over point to collect a boundary
trying to get him to drive, was pitched up outside off but Farhat wasn't falling for that, left it alone
slings it down the leg side and Farhat only needed to get some bat on it, he got his pads to it instead, four more to the fine-leg boundary
angling in towards middle and off, defended solidly towards the bowler from the crease
short and wide, crunches it towards point, Dilshan dives to his left and saves the single
back of a length outside off, Farhat waits for it and chops it down to point
some away swing for Malinga there, pushed it wide of mid-off for a quick single
short of a good length on middle and off, punched towards point
full on the leg stump, flicked away uppishly past that leg gully fielder, towards fine leg, for a single
slower one bowled full on the off, chipped into the leg side in front of mid-on for a single
swinging in and onto the pads, Farhat misses out an attempt to flick that square, struck on the pads
low full toss, was aiming for the yorker there but it didn't quite work out, Farhat cashes in, creaming it through the covers
back of a length outside off, chops it behind point for a quick single
back of a length outside off, guides it down towards third man for a single
back of a length outside off, called a wide, good bounce there and Younis leaves it be, borderline wide that

appeal for lbw, the umpire turns it down and the Sri Lankans have gone for a review, short of a good length outside off, nips back in, Younis gets his foot outside the line to defend that, struck outside the line and would have been missing off. The decision is upheld
shortish on the off, knocks it down in front of point, was behind that one nicely
bowled it full on the off, driven towards mid-off firmly but straight to the fielder
an attempted inswinging yorker, Younis tries to drive that straight but the bat turns in his hand, gets a couple wide of mid-on instead
Malinga fires that one down the leg side, called a wide by the umpire
swung in towards middle, Farhat got forward and just turned it into the leg side towards mid-on
gets it to swing in again, lands on a good length, mistimes a drive towards mid-on
another one down the leg side, called a wide again, a fair number we;ve had this innings
goodish length on leg stump, still getting it to curve in, tries to flick it square does Farhat but is struck high on the pads
well kept by Sangakkara, was another misdirected delivery on the pads, Farhat tried to flick it fine, it clipped the pads and Sanga took it well diving full length to his right
driven soundly this time, fullish on leg stump and that was timed well to mid-on
an inswinging yorker on middle, turned into the leg side towards square leg
Younis beaten while trying to play a drive, played outside the line to that one and it nipped in to beat him through the gate
back of a length, there is a gully in place, chops it hard towards Jeevan Mendis at gully, landed short of him, he fumbled and they picked up a single
drops it short on the off, knocks it down in front of point
rocks back to that one and defends it with a full face back to the bowler
lovely shot, was slower and landed full and in the slot outside off, Farhat drove it elegantly through mid-off and extra cover to pick up a boundary
that's four more, fine leg is inside the circle, Dilhara bowls a short one outside leg, Farhat just has to whip it past that fielder
goodish length on middle, gets across and defends it back to the bowler

tried to surprise him with the slower one there, turned out to be a full toss just below the waist, Younis played it smartly, reaching forward and rolling his wrists over it to fetch four more towards fine leg
oversteps and concedes yet another freehit, they also pinch a single
an inswinging yorker, Farhat can only make a bit of room and dig it out past the bowler towards long-on for a single
another slow full toss and played smartly yet again by Younis, just a gentle flick through square leg and that gives him three runs
slower one bowled full outside off, slices it wide of third man for a couple of runs
oh dear, another no-ball, it was an excellent short ball that took Farhat by surprise, took the edge and went wide of third man, they run two and another freehit to come now
slower one that surprised Farhat, he was into the pull a little early and ended up mistiming it wide of mid-on, a single is all he'll get
goodish length on middle, gets behind it and defends it to extra cover
straying on the pads and he flicks it away uppishly but safely for three runs over midwicket
pitched up on the off stump, driving that one through the line to mid-off
back of a length outside off, moving away a bit, leaves it alone, shouldering arms
shortish outside off, opens the face to guide it towards third man for a single
dropped it short on middle, got on the back foot and knocked that one down on the pitch, kept it down, well played
that one doesn't turn, lands outside leg stump and holds its line, Younis gets some bat on it, closes the face at the last moment, a chase from short fine leg is in vain
bowls it flat on middle, holds its line again, defended down the pitch
turned away off the front foot through square leg for a single, Mathews scores a direct-hit at the non-striker's end and they get another run off the ricochet
fires it short on middle, flat again, turned past square leg for a single
full on middle and off, played towards extra cover
turns in from outside off, gets on the back foot and works it wide of square leg for one more
short of a good length on leg stump, turns it towards midwicket
slower one bowled full on the off, drove it wide of mid-off for a quick single
just a firm push, attempted yorker but converts it into a low full toss, punches it down the ground to beat mid-on to the boundary
banged that one short on middle, ducks under it easily
back of a length outside off, wants to cut it over point but ends up keeping it down in front of that fielder
back of a length on the off, defended towards cover, wants the single, is sent back but a little too late, a direct-hit would have had him but he wins an overthrow, missed run-out
turns it wide of midwicket for a single, lands outside leg
pushed it back down the pitch to the bowler
bowls it flat outside off, opens the face and plays it to point
drives that one down the ground towards long-on for a single
Younis fetches that one from outside off and sweeps it to deep square leg for a single
thick outside edge, tried to drive that through extra cover, it held its line, took the edge but it was well past slip, three more behind point
gets that to nip in a touch, tries to flay that through extra cover but has to check the shot as it comes back in, plays it to mid-off
pitches it up and he drives it wide of mid-off, thinks of a single but Younis sends him back
goodish length on middle, turns it wide of midwicket for a single
shortish on leg stump, plays it down towards fine leg for a single
inside edge as he tries to drive that off the good length, doesn't miss the off stump by much, Sanga does superbly diving full length to his right to save four
shortish outside leg stump, gets a couple down to fine leg as it clips the pads
tossed up outside leg stump, turns it past square leg for a sinlge
flighted, lands full on middle, driven hard but straight to midwicket
tossed up outside off, pushed it straight to extra cover
defended with a reach back down the pitch
shortish on middle, gets front and across and plays it to square leg
turned towards square leg from the off stump
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and defends it to point
nips back in from a good length outside off, defended from the crease into the off side
lovely, angled in straight towards middle and leg, Younis shuffled a hint and glanced it down to the fine-leg boundary
goodish length on middle and off, turns it towards square leg for a quick single
takes chance, was on a good length outside off, got a bit of width and he freed his arms, slapping it over mid-off for a boundary
slower one bowled short on middle, drops it in front of square leg for a single
getting it to turn in from outside off, chopped towards point

takes it from outside off, had made his mind up, slog-swept it over midwicket, Malinga was quite a few yards inside the ropes at long-on and couldn't get to the ball in time, landed wide of his outstretched hand and just inside the ropes
opens the face and plays that one to short third man
raises his half-century with a meaty drive past mid-off, was tossed up, he got to the pitch and caressed it wide of mid-off
bowls it flat on middle, gets forward and blocks solidly
the googly, didn't turn away much, made room to cut that through point, missed
goodish length on the off, gets forward and plays it to mid-off
replicates that leg-glance he had played a little earlier, full on middle and leg and he flicks it away fin wristily
bowled it full outside off, reached for a drive, turned the face at the last moment and played it back to the bowler
pitched up on middle, driven past the bowler down towards mid-on
back of a length on the off, punched towards point off the back foot
goodish length, slight hesitation initially as they think of a single but it's all good in the end, they make it easily
pushed it full on the off, driven through the line to mid-off
gets front and across to that and taps that towards midwicket
short of a good length on the off, pushes it back down the pitch
yorker length on middle, dug out in front of mid-on, pinches a quick single

Given out lbw and Farhat has referred it, belatedly, landed on a good length on middle and nipped back in, Farhat got across and tried to play straight but was done in by the inward movement there, was struck in front of middle, and the umpire's original decision was upheld.
pitched it up outside off, opened the face and drove it towards point
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and knocks it into the off side
drops that short delivery into the off side in front of point and races through for a single
didn't know how to handle that short one, got a leading edge as he tried to drop it into the leg side, turned the face too early on that one
short and wide, cuts that uppishly behind point and wide of third man for a couple of runs
shortish and misdirected, down the leg side, called a wide
back of a length outside off, opens the face and plays it with soft hands towards gully
drops it short and Sarfraz ducks under that easily
pitches it up outside off, driven towards mid-off past the bowler
pitched up outside off, squeezed through point into the deep for a couple of runs
beautifully driven, leans into the drive and bisects that gap between mid-off and extra cover to reach his half-century, a very fluent innings this
gets forward and defends it towards cover
goodish length outside off, guides it towards point
short of a good length outside off, gets an inside edge onto his pads as he tries to dab it into the off side
shortish on the off, whips it past midwicket for an easy single
thick outside edge, short of a good length, Younis opened the face on that one but it went much finer than he intended, went through the slips and gully for a boundary, just two needed now
back of a length outside off, stands tall to that one and defends it to point
banged in short, pulled away through square leg to Malinga in the deep for a single
all over, sliding it on middle and leg, turned away through square leg into the deep, Pakistan have won this easily
